Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 98th overall pick, by Toronto in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Titus Cortright (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2019, off Joshua Fortes (OAK)...

Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...

Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/4/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
